attributes.action: Oppose any futher building of Mosques in ENGLAND
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I understand that requests have been made for yet another Mosque to be built in England.
Many of the indigenous people of this country Oppose any further building of Mosque`s in England.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
